titles.title: For the relief of the R. E. Goodson Construction Company, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/22/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to R.E. Goodson Construction Company, Inc., in South Carolina, in full satisfaction of all claims of and on behalf of the Corporation against the United States for ordnance and explosive clearance performed in 2000 for the Army Corps of Engineers at the former Conway Bombing and Gunnery Range in Conway, South Carolina.
